1.content:
Zinnia City, like many vorish universes, tends to consist of the scrawny and vulnerable folk - the prey - intermingling with the large and powerful predators. And unfortunately for you, you happen to be on the scrawny side. Most people of your disposition would fear predators, always shying away from them for fear of getting shoveled down their maws like so many unlucky meals. But for some reason, you can't help but find yourself... drawn to predators. Fascinated by their sheer power, their gluttonous tendencies, and their ability to turn whole people into pure soft layers of plumpness. When one of them happens to catch your eye, you can only wonder... will you be able to win their heart? Or will you end up as pudge on their hips like so many prey before you?

But before we can delve into that, you have to declare... what sort of predator would most catch your attention?
1.title: Hopeless Romantic

11.content:
Name: Eleanor
Age: 25
Species: Lemur
Bio: Eleanor is a debt collector, and in Zinnia City, you can probably guess just what that entails. That's right - if you fail to pay your debts around here, you'll end up gurgling away into pudge while your stuff gets repossessed. Outside of her job, though, she's quite a friendly and kind woman, but you'll have to have a high tolerance for predators if you want to hang out with her, as all her friends happen to be debt collectors too, frequently chatting together while ignoring the protests and squirms coming from all their engorged guts.

Name: Larae
Age: 23
Species: White Reed Frog
Bio: Larae’s found that just about no pair of pants will be stretchy enough to contain her wide, thick hips for long, and at this point, she’s just stopped trying, going around in nothing but a black hoodie. Nobody dares complain about her bottomless, though, as she has a reputation as an open predator! Liking to climb up onto buildings or into trees and reach her long, sticky tongue down to grab people below. From there, she makes her cash by stealing everything they have on them, before either just swallowing them whole, or licking them all over to lube them up before slipping them up her ass!

Name: Alida
Age: 29
Species: Opossum
Bio: Dedicated to caring for the weak and feeble. While not a typical predator by any means, being on the scrawny side herself, she has a knack for shrinking others down. Luckily, she mostly uses this for good - she has the ability to heal or soothe others with her womb, which she puts to good use in her job as a nurse. Of course, if a patient is just rude of annoying, she might just slip them other places instead - no harm in some ‘vanishing’ every once in a while. Mainly, though, if you show her kindness, she will return that kindness tenfold back to you.
11.title: Slim Girlfriends

111.content: And of course, the obligatory question: what gender are you, yourself?
111.title: Eleanor

1112.content:
'The best part of living on your own?' You thought to yourself as you kicked off your skinny jeans and popped the door on your apartment refrigerator, 'No-pants movie nights.'

Grabbing a styrofoam container of leftover Chinese from the top shelf, you spun on your heel and trotted into the tiny living room of your squalid flat, your pale, panty-clad cheeks bouncing pertly with every step. Flicking a lot of copper red hair out of your face, you slumped down onto your Craigslist couch and grabbed the remote.

At twenty-three years old, the solo bachelorette life was comfortable. You worked a modest gig doing advertising for a local club - it didn't pay well, but it was enough to keep a roof over your head and one of Zinnia's slummy districts. Of course, the apartment life wasn't all pizza and glamour; it meant putting up with a constant racket from your neighbors, and tonight was no exception.

You didn't know much about the scuzzy guy living across the hall from you, but he seemed to be engaged in a particularly heated argument with someone and had decided to carry on in the hallway right outside of your apartment. With an irritated sigh, you set the remote and leftovers down, and padded back across the kitchen on socked feet before pressing a curious ear to your door...

--- --- --- --- ---

"...Look, I already told the last guy what came 'round - I don't have the money right now, so why don't you tuck that pretty tail where the sun don't shine and get lost?"

"Despite whatever finely-articulated argument you may have used to with the previous collector - I won't be so easily persuaded. I'm with a different agency, you see, and if you are unable to make the minimum payment right now at this very moment, we will be forced to use other means to recoup the remainder of your debt."

"Iz'at supposed to be some kinda threat? You think I'm scared of you, scrawny little lemur bitch?? How's about you step in 'ere and I show you how we deal with paper-snatchin' pricks like you around-WHOA WHAT THE-mmph!"

--- --- --- --- ---

You had been listening to the altercation with a detached interest, but the sound of your neighbor's tirade suddenly cut short - and followed by a muffled, squelching noise - set your heart racing. Standing on tiptoe, you pressed your eye to the tiny peephole in your door, but were met with a cloudy grey blur. You cursed quietly to yourself; you'd forgotten that the glass lens was busted. Pushing your ear back to the door again, you could hear what sounded like gulping noises, followed by a contented feminine sigh.

Your curiosity got the better of you.

Holding the knob firmly as you turned it to avoid making any noise, you gently prized your door open just a crack and peeked out into the hall. There, with her back turned to you, was a slender lemur-woman in a form fitting blazer and pencil skirt. You missed the visual cue of her tufted grey ears twitching to tell you that she had heard your intrusion on the scene, but it became obvious enough when she wheeled around, swinging into view her exposed, massively distended - and energetically squirming gut.

The sudden movement and the sight of your now obviously swallowed neighbor startled you enough that you fell clumsily backward and away from the door, causing it to swing to open. The lemur-woman was now standing in full view in your doorway, staring down at you in nothing but your panties and a t-shirt, and she looked...
1112.title: Meeting Eleanor

114.content:
Name: Valerie
Age: 27
Species: Skunk
Bio: Cold, malicious, and down right ruthless, this anthro will hunt down any target, as long as it's for the right price. Straight from birth this woman was raised to be an assassin, having her body both trained and heavily modified to kill anyone. Her infamy has been respected and feared by those that dwell in the underworld; however, whenever she's up top, she's mocked about the stereotyping of her species stinking, though after being modified, her gas can literally kill a person with a single whiff. As a predator, she's satisfied with either gulping up her targets or pushing them up her rump, which gains most of the fat after digesting them and later expelling them out as more gas to kill her future targets. During a usual assassination job, she encounters you, which makes her heart melt immediately.

Name: Sabrina
Age: 25
Species: Crocodile
Bio: Serving eleven years in the military, she's now stationed in Zinnia City and despite not being active in the military, she still has a bit of power among the ranks as a drill instructor. Strict and somewhat sadistic, but well disciplined, if any of her students misbehave or don't cut it, down the hatch they go, where she'll work them off until they're nothing more but nutrients for her already big, buff muscles. After her friends signed her up on a dating site, she's currently nervous for the first time, as they're aware that she's a predator and now waiting for you outside the base she's at, which ironically you have a connection to.
114.title: More girlfriends!

1143.content:
Name: Victoria
Age: 19
Species: Cheetah
Bio: A young college student, Victoria is just getting fully in the swing of celebrating her complete freedom from her absurdly pro prey mother. The kicker being that Victoria doesn’t know any other pred who eats even half as many prey as dear old momma. Of course, this double standard only applied to her own consumption. Victoria wasn’t allowed a single prey the entire time she lived at home. So now she’s ready to completely and totally cut loose.

Thankfully she has no clue how to hunt. Thankfully as long as you bring her prey you’re off the menu. Unfortunately, you’re figuring this out on the run yourself.

Name: Melody
Age: 23
Species: Great White Shark
Bio: One of the meanest and toughest preds around, at least when she’s hungry, Melody makes it a point to keep off the pounds as much as possible. It makes you slow, and slow lets the coppers catch you. A huge pred is much scarier, but a slim pred is often underestimated even when her pale belly and leathery gray back warning others to beware. Her boss knows how to use this well, and Melody has been the primary enforcer in the gang for a while, with a steady elimination rate for the worst performers.

But after meeting you and going straight, Melody will have no other option but to eat her way out of the gang, out of the jail and out of crime for good. Good luck being leverage over your girlfriend’s head...
1143.title: More girlfriends

choices: Surely She’s Not Gonna Eat Me?
Obviously Her Hunger is the Sexual Kind
11431.content:
Normally, Elephants don’t really have to worry about becoming prey for an average pred. Standing a full head taller than a Grizzly and beating even most sharks in height, only the Orca, Great White Shark and vanishingly rare dinosaur and mythical anthros are both carnivorous and larger than the Elephant. Not to mention the sheer girth of the Elephant that made the average healthy weight of the largest land mammal fully 5 times what most Wolves and Humans weigh or a couple dozen times what rodents like Rats or Mice might weight.

Unfortunately, this makes Elephants a truly rare delicacy that those few extremely large or especially voracious preds who can stomach so much meat dearly love. And you are an absolute runt that the average pred could potentially manage! Your still big by human standards, standing 6’6” and weighing just over 300 pounds. But that puts you a head shorter than the average Grizzly with a huge host of potential preds that most Elephants never need fear. Wolves, Lions, Jaguars, Panthers and Tigers could all prey on you if they wanted.

Your grandmother, the matriarch of the herd as you still thought of your extended family that lived in the same specially made apartment complex, hadn’t wanted you to leave yet. If she’d had her way, you’d have been even with your mother’s 8’ even before leaving. But you couldn’t control yourself anymore.

A young bull Elephant, your instincts demanded that you exercise full freedom and take control of your life. Which led to endless fighting with the hierarchy of the herd until finally they decided you had to go. They were nice about it, sending you to college for free and packing you up, but you knew what this was. It was the boot from the herd.

Your grandmother did have some last advice for you before you left though. “Jeremy,” the elderly matriarch began. “You have to be careful in this cruel world, and protect yourself.”

You nod, rolling your eyes. “I know that Grandma. If someone wants to eat me the law gives me the right to resist with anything short of lethal force. Isn’t that why you taught me so many ways to knock out a pred?”

Your grandmother smiles. “That will keep you safe from the short term pred who simply tries to gulp you down on sight. But what is far more insidious is the girls who play a longer game. If you give your heart to a girl who thinks with her stomach that’s where you will find yourself sooner or later.”

That did not sound like advice you wanted to hear. If it weren’t for the fact that it fairly clearly could save your life someday you’d have walked out rather than listen to this annoying garbage. “And I bet you’ve got some kind of sage advice for how to tell which girls think with their stomachs?” You challenge, beyond ready to get out of here.

Your grandmother nods, smiling slightly. She sat down so that she’d be looking up into your eyes instead of looking down on you, taking your hands to grasp your attention fully. “I do. Two ways, neither perfect alone, but both solid and nearly perfect together.”

“The first is to pay attention to her species. Herbivores like Zebras, Giraffes and most Whales are rarely preds. Omnivores like Gorillas, Bears and such are twice as likely to be preds and carnivores like Lions are ten times as likely. It’s simple instinct. The second is her weight. A fat girl eats a lot, and the chances that includes prey are rather high. Chubby girls probably aren’t ruled by their stomachs, but some exercise to cut weight gain as much as possible to keep from scaring off prey. But skinny girls almost certainly are not vicious preds because there’s simply no way to eat prey every week and stay thin. Nobody has a metabolism that good.”

You couldn’t really argue with the advise, and rolled your eyes. “Don’t worry Grandma. I don’t plan on being what rips some fatass’s pants.” Despite your assurance to her, you know full well that you wouldn’t follow both guidelines strictly. It was obvious to stay away from the fat carnivore, but you refused to be limited to scrawny herbivores. Thin carnivores and thick herbivores would both get your attention, as would chubby omnivores...

Okay, maybe not chubby omnivores. Two maybes is a lot more dangerous than one solid no. This might take some more thought after all.

Eventually you made it to campus, long since having grown frustrated trying to figure out what to do when neither extreme was present and setting up your room in high bad humor. Which only got worse when you saw your roommate.

He introduced himself as Harry, and you couldn’t help thinking his parents must have had a sense of humor. You’d never seen someone with so much hair! Every inch of the enormous Sea Otter’s 5’3” 500 pound frame was covered in thick, thick hair so that you couldn’t see his skin to save your life.

Even worse, the marine rodent clearly had someone’s remains in his stomach, and you could feel him eyeing you for a possible meal. You figured immediately that it would be a good idea to remind the punk that size alone wasn’t the only reason that Elephants were rarely prey for others. Another reason is an incredible degree of strength that made Elephants kings of physical strength among prey.

So you grab him by his neck and pin him against the wall, forcing him up off of the floor in spite of his weight. When his eyes are level with your own you give him a deep glare. “Don’t get any funny ideas Harry. I’m stronger than you.” It was half bluff, but you’d already proven it was only half.

Preds inevitably were much stronger than prey, but the gap wasn’t always absolute. Each species had their own advantages over others. If Harry were to try to eat you in the pool you’d be practically defenseless against his ability to hunt in the water. But if it were a contest of pure muscle? You could handle that much, especially when you were as pissed as you were right now.

The threat worked like a charm though, and you see fear in his eyes. The idiot probably thinks your a pred yourself. You drop him and the heavy thud almost makes you wince as Harry lands on his immense butt. Then you turn away to find somewhere to blow some steam and find some chicks. Maybe spend the night with one and lose the V card that the herd had made it impossible to get rid of.

You do some looking around, eventually finding a good hangout with great music and gorgeous gals. Checking out the place and the selection you see several excellent picks, but you hold off. You want to find the perfect woman for tonight.

And then, hearing the door open and turning to look, you found her. The cheetah girl was an absolute knockout. She was 5’5” wearing a black outfit that called complete attention to her slender figure and hypnotic spots. You doubted that she weighed more than 100 pounds, but she carried herself with such grace that it awed you. Then she looked in your direction, and smiled.

Busted for staring! Damn. Now you had to make a move. For a moment you hear your grandmother saying that carnivore species are far more likely to be preds, but just look at this girl! She’s clearly never swallowed a prey in her life! It will be fine.

You make your way over to her and strike up a conversation. She introduces herself as Victoria, and soon proves both witty and smart. As you chat she keeps giving you this look that sends shivers down your spine, a look that says that she is hungry for something.

(Alright, I admit I took some liberties with the whole “prey weaker than the pred” thing. Here’s the thing, Jeremy the Elephant here is strong enough to bring Victoria other prey, but he is too slow for facing a Cheetah. When Victoria decides to eat him she’s able to dodge every one of his haymakers and then to gulp him when he’s exhausted. The balance of power between them is just barely enough that Victoria doesn’t feel like fighting him into her belly as long as he’s bringing her plenty of other prey. But if he lets her starve or pisses her off there’s a lot she can do about it, including eating him.)
11431.title: Going To College

Name: Darline
Age: 31

Bio: Works as a custodian at the local college campus. She keeps the fact that she’s a pred a close secret, but frequently, she finds herself unable to resist the urge to swallow an unlucky student down, despite the fact that she’d definitely be fired if anybody found out. Her gluttony has done more than just make her fat, it's also improved her profits; she tends to grab passersby and swallow them whole to make her belly dancing shows a little more interesting.

All of those who work at a call center like this are usually just desperate to make some cash, since working for a boss like this would probably just be a complete nightmare... unless, of course, seeing her gulp down your colleagues was actually the highlight of your otherwise boring days.
12.title: Plump Girlfriends

121.content: And of course, the obligatory question: what gender are you, yourself?
121.title: Darline

1211.content:
Regardless of what species you are, whether or not you are prey or a predator, starting anew at another new school is always a challenge. And the argument could be made that no one in Zinnia City knew this fact more than Patrick. He had been in and out of different schools throughout most of his childhood, not because he was a troubled delinquent, but because his family had to move frequently due to their jobs. However, he was semi-confident in himself that his move to the large and well-funded Zinnia College would be the last time he would have to go through the experience.

It was definitely heart wrenching for him to say goodbye to his family, but the idea of the University Lifestyle and the thought of being on his own was far too enticing for someone his age to resist. It was slightly concerning that he did not even have a proper idea of what he wanted to major in, but these fears were dashed as he remembered his old and, quite frankly, uneventful life. He wanted a change of pace, meet some new people and perhaps make some friends that would stick around. Today was to be the first day of his assigned classes to start, and he was certainly passionate for them.

However, just because he was enthusiastic did not mean he was fearless. Patrick repeated to his mental self over and over again as he walked from his room in the hallway of the boy’s dormitory to just be confident. But it had no effect. Why would he be so scared? It had to do with his species, which stood out amidst the overloaded and fast breeding rodents and other mammals that flooded the hallways with timid prey trying to look as small as possible. It made him a target, an easy one at that for some predator to snatch him up and turn him into pudge. He was a...
1211.title: Male

choices: He should just watch and see what she does next...
12114.content:
Like most squirrels, Patrick was just about a ball of anxiety! Anxious that he’d make a bad first impression in front of his professors, anxious that he wouldn’t be able to keep up with the college workload, anxious that he wasn’t going to be nearly as smart as any of his peers, anxious that he’d end up losing his scholarships and going into endless debt, anxious that he’d never come up with a major to declare… and, of course, most of all, anxious about getting eaten!

Faculty were forbidden from eating students… which was a good thing, too, as a lot of them looked like they’d be extremely dangerous. On the other hand, students were allowed to devour other students ‘on a reasonable basis’ - whatever that means. And college tended to be where most predators got their ‘awakenings’, so… well, a recent study found that the Zinnia College student body shrinks by about 18% over the course of each school year. And as far as prey went, he stuck out like a sore thumb!

As the day progressed, though, his anxiety slowly faded. The dawn of the fall semester seemed to be a cause for celebration, and songs were playing and free food was being offered all over campus. Huge anthros who he thought were intimidating predators turned out to be pretty chill when he talked to them. His professors seemed to be interesting and funny, and he was already a tad fascinated by the glimpses of the material he was being given. Overall, the jubilant atmosphere on campus calmed him down, and convinced him it wouldn’t be so bad here…

Eventually, he had about an hour-long break inbetween classes, so he slipped away from the crowds, heading into one of the less used buildings to get some space. The opossum girl behind the counter gave him a smile, but beyond that, and the occasional student wandering around, the place seemed pretty empty, since there were no classes here today. He got even more privacy when he tucked himself away at one of the booths, his short figure obscuring him from anyone around.

With a smile, he took out his laptop and started going over the syllabi, making a little calendar of every assignment that was going to be due over the semester. As he did, he couldn’t help but overhear something… what sounds like heavy hooves, trotting down the hallway. Heavy enough to shake the table ever so slightly. He raised his ears, fearing that he may be alone with some giant predator… only to breathe in relief as he saw it was just a campus custodian. Since she was a faculty, there was no way she would be allowed to eat anybody… right?

Still, he couldn’t help but be fascinated by how big he was. Sure, she was a hippo, and hippos were supposed to be pretty big… but she was large even among them! She stood quite a few feet taller than Patrick, with a heaving, fat belly that poked out beneath her overly strained shirt, easily dragging a much smaller cart around as she lazily trotted down the hallway. She didn’t seem to notice him in that booth at all, which gave him the opportunity to steal a few shameful glances at that humongous, pudgy rump, barely contained by her overworked pants.

Once she passed, you went right back to working on your laptop… but eventually you noticed that she seemed to be loitering around this section of the building a lot. She didn’t seem to be cleaning anything, and it’s not like there was anybody even over here… what was she doing pacing around so much? Eventually, you notice something. There was a wolf guy sitting at one of the other booths, and every time she passed, she seemed to pause, glancing at him nervously. Did… she have a crush on him, or something…? You suppose he was pretty hunky.

As you work, you occasionally glance up at the amusing spectacle of a custodian apparently crushing on one of the students, maybe trying to work up the nerve to speak with him. That might be an interesting show! However, one time, as she’s passing, you hear something other than just her hoofsteps… was that… her massive stomach growling? You freeze up as you start to rethink the situation. Were those… hungry looks she was giving him? No, that wasn’t possible… faculty weren’t allowed to eat students…!

Before you could react, though, she had stopped right next to his table this time, and stood still there long enough for the wolf to notice and look up at her… only to see a massive hippo lady licking her lips! You can only watch in horror as those giant, pudgy hands reach up to grab him by the sides, suddenly lifting him out of his seat as he’s dazed by the sight of that massive, slobbery maw sliding open, her warm, foul breath washing over him! He can only let out a fraction of a yelp before those jaws slam down around his upper body, muffling his protests!

The anxiousness of the hippo seems to fade away as she’s overwhelmed with his taste, a satisfied look on her face as she suckles on and licks all over the student in her maw, his kicking legs dangling from her lips. Apparently, she must have not noticed you, and figured there would be no witnesses to her little work snack! You wanted to do something, but… you were sort of mesmerized by the sight of her tasting him, as his entire upper body is lodged in his maw. Like a deer in headlights, you sit there, trying to process the situation...
12114.title: Snacking on the Job!

choices: Darline just wants to talk anime
Darline goes in for a kiss!
121142.content:
The gross sounds of the Hippo custodian’s tongue swishing over the wolf’s chest and head made Patrick shiver out of both fear and awe. The soon to be pudge desperately attempted to push her off of him, but the hidden power that she possessed was far too great for him to fight back against; he was food and he knew it. His canine head was pushed into her esophagus with an audible glurk, wet slime coating his face and lubing him down to his inevitable fate

Patrick watched on as the rest of the Wolf slid past the janitor’s blunt teeth, hungry for squirming meat as he kicked his paws at her fat breasts and tummy. The sounds that the Hippo women made as she swallowed this stranger made the squirrel squirm with disgust and arousal, opening her mouth wide with a great big ‘ah’ before the last bit of wolf was snugly entombed in her maw. She slurped up the drool pooling in her mouth and dropped on the floor before swallowing his legs whole.

Patrick didn’t do anything to help. He just sat there, mesmerized at the disappearance of his peer. He watched the hippo’s blubbery neck bulge with the last bit of his body as he was deposited into her stomach with ease. Her shiny, rubbery belly had ballooned with its new occupant, wobbling and quivering like a plush waterbed, making all sorts of glooshing and glorping sounds like an organic orchestra. With her eyes closed in contentment, the squirrel watched as she began to walk towards his booth to rest her, her plump rear end nearly squishing him as he shifted to the side at the last second.

Patrick was now pinned between a wall and the biggest predator he had ever seen, her fat gut only slightly squirming as she sucked her hands clean before letting out a huge, rolling belch of satisfaction. “A-ahhhhh…” The big Hippo purred in an almost angelic voice as she gripped both sides of her distended gut to snake it, feeling her prey move in panic under her thick fat. “You freshman...you just keep getting tastier and tastier each year…”

The hippo licked her fingers again, savoring the taste of her former meal and making disgusting sucking noises. “Mmmm…and they always taste better when they don’t know what’s happening, too.” The squirrel watched on, disgusted with himself as he felt his member harden against his will from just observing at the ball of blubber the wolf had gone to, jiggling and shaking like an ocean. He was so entranced by it that he didn’t notice the hippo’s eyes finally opening again and landing on his body. “EEEEP!” She let out a shriek of shock, her domineering persona quickly fading as fear and panic crept back into her.

“Oh...oh God, were you there this whole time?! I didn’t even see you...oh no!”. The hippo’s relaxation had come to an abrupt halt as she realized that she had been caught in the act. “Oh god, n-now you’re going to tell on me, and I’m gonna lose my job, and-!”

“N-no…” Patrick spoke up as he cautiously scooted closer to the Hippo in his booth. “I won’t tell anyone…”. He probably should though, when he thought about it. She was a faculty member who broke the rules, she had just eaten a fellow student right in front of him! And yet, despite how wrong it all was...the look of fear and hopelessness on her face utterly devastated him beyond the rest he witnessed. He wanted to help, even though he knew he shouldn’t.

“Wha...what?” The Hippo spoke in between sobs and hiccups as Patrick’s words registered in her head. “B-But I-...Oh!” Suddenly, she let out a gasp as she turned her head to face the witness to her crime, only to find him pitifully trying to cover up an obvious bulge in his crotch. She blinked a couple of times, and slowly smiled, turning the rest of her body towards the squirrel to make it seem like she was even bigger.

“Naww, you like me, don’t ya, lil’ squirrely?” The giant hippo women cooed as she rubbed her bulging belly hypnotically at the entranced squirrel in front of her. Patrick didn’t want to admit it, but...he did indeed. He had never witnessed someone getting eaten before, he had always heard stories about it but never seen it in person. It was both horrifying and kind of beautiful, seeing someone just fade away as more of someone else replaced them. The custodian gently grabbed one of the paws hovering over his bulge and pressed it to her rubbery gut, letting it sink into her fat. “Go on, now. I know you want to rub it, it’s all over your face!” She giggled as she shook her tummy tauntingly.

Without thinking, Patrick began to rub little circles in the hippo’s flab, the giant sphere offering so much plush softness for his fingers to play with. He didn't object when the hippo grabbed his other paw and placed on her gut as well, nor did he when she scooted his body even closer to her, his whole torso practically squished up against her. Within minutes, he was outright hugging the predator with as much as his arms could wrap around, his chin resting atop the slowly squirming dome.

“Mmm...my name is Darline~” The custodian purred as she fondled Patrick’s bushy tail, the appendage wrapping around her and giving her a pleasing tickle. “What’s your name, squirrely?”.

Patrick sighed and let his face fall into the stomach he was massaging, the last of the wolf’s squirms dying out as it was converted into more plush fat. “It’s...Patrick…” He let out, his voice muffled by the layers of flab pushing into his tiny mouth. This was all so weird for him. He knew he should have been disgusted with himself for what he was doing, but...he was just so won over, so relaxed with Darline. “Are you...gonna eat me, too?” He breathed out, lifting up his face to meet the grinning hippo’s.

“Mmmm...no, squirrely. At least, not now. That wolfy will keep me going for a couple of hours...you p-promise you won’t tell anyone about this, right?” Darline stuttered a little bit, revealing her inner shyness for a split second. Patrick nodded and forced himself off from her comfy paunch. “Oh, c’mon, you little baby!” With that, she easily lifted him up in her arms as if he were literally a baby, causing him to squirm in surprise in her grip as she carried his limp form over to the bathroom! Before he could much understand what was going on, she plopped down on his feet in front of the sink in the bathroom. “I’ve let you sleep in as much as I could. Now get dressed and get ready!”

With that, Patrick went through the motions of his morning in a zombie-like stupor, brushing his teeth, taking a shower with Darline, getting dressed in light clothing, helping her pack her massive car (though she did most of the work there, as many of her suitcases were almost as big as Patrick’s entire body). Finally, he settled into the oversized passenger seat as Darline plopped her butt on the driver’s side. “Alright, you crybaby. Now you can get some shut-eye. But I’ll be waking you up soon, cause I ain’t driving the whole seven hours!”

With the relaxing movement of the massive car around him, he almost immediately dazed off, dreaming of jiggling asses as he curled up against the door. Eventually, though, he was once again pried from his restful dreams by the feeling of a giant hand shaking him awake. He groaned as he sat up, looking around in that confused stupor that anyone who’s been woken up from a car nap can relate to. He looked around to see that they were at a rest stop, and glanced over at Darline… only to gaze quizzically at her bulging stomach.

“... what? I grabbed a snack at a gas station a little while back. Sue me!” She shrugged, before finally clamoring out of the car. Patrick looked around, confused, as she trotted over to the passenger side, lifting him up and plopping him in front of the steering wheel before sitting down for a break from driving. “Alright, squirrely. We got two and a half hours left, and I ain’t driving anymore. Hope you’ve got the energy, cause you’re leading the way from here~!”

Humiliatingly, Patrick had to sit in a sort of booster chair just to be able to drive this huge car, but once he was on the road, he sort of settled into a rhythm, listening to music with Darline as she chilled beside him. “So, yer ‘nanas’ never met a predator before, huh?” The hippo asks. “I hope I make a… good first impression~”

“Well, I wouldn’t say it’s the first time…” Patrick shrugged. “We… did have a lioness move into town a long time ago, when I was just a little cub. She, well… she ate a lot of townsfolk. At least a couple a day… treated the town like it was her private buffet. Even ate my parents…”

Darline seemed amused by the story at first, but then, she frowned. “Your parents…? Oh dear… I’m sorry to hear that…” She asked. “What ended up happening?”

“Well… the town had such a small population already, there really was a risk that she could just wipe us all out, if nobody did anything about it…” Patrick shrugged, hardly remembering these times. “So, like, a bunch of them stormed her house with pitchforks and stuff… apparently, it was like a huge fight…!”

“Oh, my!” Darline tilted her head, surprised by the story. She had heard a few tales of powerful and experienced predators go out into the countryside to try and depopulate entire tiny towns… but it seems like this predator ended up getting treated to karma. “Well, of course, you have my promise that I won’t eat anybody at all while I’m there! This hippo’s going on a diet for the weekend!”

Eventually, they crossed right passed a sign - Sweet Cicely Town.

Eventually, they stopped at a nice big farmhouse by the lake, to find...

Nana Puts Patrick and Darline To Work
1211423211121233313241.content:
As Darline stepped out of her car onto the beaten dirt path that led to Patrick's family farmhouse, she paused as she took in her surroundings. Zinnia City was where she was born and raised, and she had never known what it was like for the world to be so...quiet. There was a gentle breeze blowing across her fatty flesh as she stared out into the horizon, picking out the humble hamlet of Sweet Cicely on the sloping banks of the lake.

"Woah..." Darline breathed as Patrick followed her out of the open door, joining by her side. To him, the view of the little town on the water was humdrum and dull, but seeing the hippo so entranced by the sight of it made him feel a little proud of his country upbringing. "You grew up here, Patrick? Geez, I almost feel jealous."

"Eh, you'd feel different after living here for most of your life." Patrick shrugged as he leaned into Darline's flabby hip. "There isn't really anything to do around here, except for the annual corn festival. I always liked getting to see the Corn Queen Pageant, the Husk-Off, the Corn-o-Rama...I sound like a country bumpkin, don't I?"

"Mmmm, not at all." Darline drooled a little at the thought of all that food in one place. "I like this place, it's a lot like you. Tiny, cute, a little shy, but always a blast to be around." She wrapped a pudgy arm around Patrick's shoulder's and pressed him up into her gut, to which he nuzzled like a pillow affectionately. Sweet Cicely was about as generic a small town one could get, but he could see why some folks from the city can find it attractive.

Sweet Cicely had pastel suburban homes, a single Elementary and High School with the same name as the town, and the main street that led up to a town square. Everyone liked hot dogs, and apple pie, and old cars. The mandatory attire was flannel with blue jeans, and if you were rich you had to have a bolo tie. Patrick was afraid how Darline might be taken here, considering the last time a predator showed up, but the people in the close-knit community here were friendly, and always tried to be inclusive to everyone.

Patrick's childhood home was surrounded by fields of corn, broken up by overgrown hills of rocks. The wind gently pushed through the swaying, yellowish stalks as the waves of the lake crashed down below. The farmhouse itself was covered in picturesque little wallflowers, always in need of some sort of maintenance and another paint job. Everything about the place had a pleasing feel to it...but the squirrel was concerned if his girlfriend could even fit through the front door.

Patrick and Darline's intimate moment was interrupted as they both heard the sound of a throat being cleared behind him. The squirrel turned around first to find his nana and cousin by the hippo's car, having walked out from the farmhouse to greet them. Overcome by his emotions, he wiggled out of his girlfriend's grip to run to his grandmother, giving the elderly squirrel a hug. "Nana!" He smiled as she returned his embrace. "Thanks for having us out for Labor Day Weekend. I hope it's not too much trouble."

"Don't talk nonsense, young man. You will always have a place here as long as I'm around." Nana kissed her grandson's neck, while the little youngster at her side jumped up and down, waiting for his hug from cousin Patrick. "George, wait your turn. Nana got dibs, remember?"

Patrick chuckled out loud as he looked down to see a hyperactive squirrel boy wrapping his arms around his legs. "Patrick, what's it like in the big city?! Did you have your wallet picked by a robber, do you stay up all night going to parties, do you take the bus?!" He bugged his bigger cousin with a series of questions that only made him smile. He never thought he would miss his annoying queries. The little ankle biter turned his head around and saw Darline. "Is that your girlfriend?" He pointed out to the hippo, who politely stood back as her boyfriend reconnected with his family. Careful not to shake the ground underneath them too much, she made her way towards the trio of Squirrels.

"Hello there, ma'am." Darline greeted as politely as possible to the elderly women as she released Patrick from her hug. The hippo bent down so she didn't look so imposing as brought forth a pudgy hand to offer a shake. "It's very good to meet you, you've raised a very fine young man." While the older squirrel looked hesitant, she eventually accepted Darline's handshake, the massive appendage engulfing her own hand gently. She almost looked surprised that her arm wasn't ripped out of her socket from the action.

"Likewise, Darline." Patrick's nana smiled softly, trying to put her prejudices against predators away and give her grandson's girlfriend a chance. Darline was making an attempt to not come off as scary, which she could respect, but she knew that she hadn't gotten that...healthy from eating regular food. However, she remembered the Lioness from so many years ago, and that hungry look in her eyes...this hippo didn't have that when he was with her. "I hope you've been treating my grandson well."

"Wow!' George awed at the sight of the great, big hippo. He quickly detached from Patrick's legs and stood underneath her large stomach. "You're even bigger in person! Can I touch your tummy, please?" Darline released her hand from Patrick's Nana and blushed at the sight of such a cute, innocent little kid. He looked to be entranced by how big she was, and more specifically how big her gut was. She looked back up to the little one's guardian for what to do, not wanting to overstep her boundaries, who bit her lower lip as she thought what to do herself. She forced a smile and gave a nod of affirmation, prompting Darline to gently grab the eager boy's paw to bring it to her stomach.

"...whoa, it's so...soft and warm..." George moved his paw around the underside of Darline's expansive stomach, giving her a nice massage, while Patrick and her Nana looked on in apprehension. "It's like a big pillow..." He brought up another paw, making Darline gasp a little as her flab folded over his tiny hands. She noticed that his typical, hyperactive behavior seemed to calm down as he rubbed her blubbery sphere, almost like he was being hypnotized.

"Er...George, didn't you have questions for Patrick, about the big City?" Patrick's Nana tired to put an end to the sight unfolding before her eyes. It worked, however, and the little kid instantly pulled away from Darline's gut to pester his big cousin again. With that, the Labor Day Weekend was underway. What was the first thing that the family did?

123.title: Bertha

choices: You happen to run into Bertha in the break room
A colleague confronts you over your obvious crush
1231.content:
“Good afternoon, ma’am! How are you today?”

“Terrible.”

“Oh… uh… sorry, to hear about that, ma’am.”

“Yeah… my friend just got swallowed up by some orca lady…”

“Oh, jeez, that is… pretty serious… well, ahem, speaking of which, I w-would, uh, like to tell you about an exciting new home security system that’s guaranteed to keep any predators out of-”

“My friend is gurgling away in some predator’s gut, and you’re trying to sell me things? You’re just… heartless!”

With that, there came that familiar click, and the call was over. The scrawny opossum man sitting in the cubicle could only sigh, not feeling particularly proud of his line of work… but hey, it was a living. There were dozens of cubicles lining the entire small building, all buzzing with calls and the clicking of keyboards.

In Zinnia City, even for predators, breaking and entering was illegal, but that didn’t stop some predators from sneaking into houses to swallow up entire families in their sleep. That’s what this company is for - selling home security systems designed to protect families against these sorts of predators.

The opossum, Glen, doesn’t work in the exciting parts of the company like the designing and engineering. No… he works at the call center. Going through a seemingly endless list of names of various prey families, and asking them if they’re interested in a fancy new home security. It was sort of a soul-draining job… but there was one thing that made it interesting…

In fact, speak of the devil. Glen was treated to the familiar feeling of the ground lightly shaking as a huge, looming figure approached. He didn’t even have to glance over to know just who it was - Bertha. Her eyes scanned over the crowd with a deeply unimpressed look on her face, and everybody knows even the slightest thing could set her off.

For some reason, though, Glen wasn’t nearly as scared of her as everyone else. Especially since he felt rather good about his sales this week. He pretended to keep working, but really, he was curiously listening in as the turkey stopped at the cubicle next to him. “Right, Hugo. It’s friday. How many customers did you reel in this week?”

“Twenty-three, miss!” The fox working next to him smiled, sounding relieved and proud that he had managed to surpass the quota.

“Oooh, that’s too bad,” she said, feigning disappointment. “The quota’s twenty-five. You just missed it.”

There was a long pause. “... w-what…?” The fox asked, his voice filled with shock and confusion, and most of all, terror! “No! The... the quota’s twenty! It’s always been twenty…!”

“Well, upper management has cut down on my lunch budget, so now, the quota’s twenty-five. Got it?” She rolled her eyes at his complaining, and the fox let out a little startled yelp as, with incredible strength, the massive turkey lady easily grabs him by his shirt collar and lifts him off his seat!

“No! This isn’t fair! You never said - MPH!” Before he could protest another moment, his voice was suddenly muffled. Glen couldn’t fight the urge to glance over… his breath catching in his throat at what he saw. The turkey was looking annoyed as she’d stuffed the fox’s entire upper body into her beak, only his kicking legs dangling out.

The other employees watched in horror, but Glen was almost fascinated, trailing the contours of his body as the bulge of the fox employee moved right down his throat. Desperately wishing he could feel that bulge in her feathery neck as it slowly slid down towards her gut, with his legs disappearing right into her beak until they, too, disappeared.

She let out a belch as he settled in her massive gut, which was so huge it was difficult to tell he was even in there, with just some barely noticeable bulges appearing in the part of her feathery belly that poked out beneath her overworked shirt. “Ugh! You know, nothing’s worse on the taste buds than whiny prey, Hugo,” she growled, patting her gut as she felt him squirm inside. “If you couldn’t be a good employee, you could at least be a half-decent lunch.”

Eventually, she trotted over to the next cubicle, which happened to belong to the opossum. “Glen. It’s friday. What do you got for me?”

In response, he only smiled lightly up at her. “They’re selling like hot cakes miss…!” He says, trying to seem far more enthusiastic than the rest of the employees. “I’ve signed thirty-six customers up for installments this week!”

She raised a brow, as if surprised. “Oh? Is that so? Well, good job, Glen. You’re a credit to the team,” she said, patting his head. “Keep that up, and you might even get employee of the month… hah…” With that, she let out another belch as she continued onwards, patting her gut as she went to presumably gobble down some more employees.

Meanwhile, Glen just sighed and glanced down at the throbbing bulge in the front of his pants, hidden away beneath his desk. Yup… the rest of his colleagues found her terrifying, but to Glen, she was drop dead gorgeous. He’d never been able to see a predator work like that in person, but working this job, he got to see it every single day. Just how easily the big, powerful, mean turkey lady could swallow people down and digest them in that churning prison of a gut…
1231.title: World's Best Worst Boss

12311.content:
Glen sighed with heavy exhaustion as he poured some cups worth of water into the coffee machine. He had really given it all he could to get those sales commissions, but in his mind it was worth it. The opossum didn’t care if he was seen as an asskisser for quite potentially the world’s worst boss, the rare compliment to come from her fatty beak made him feel lighter than air.

Glen shut the latch on the top of the coffee machine down and placed the pot in the warmer. Slowly, the pot filled back up again with the lifeblood of any modern office. Not having anything else to do at the moment, the opossum was content to just observe the device go through with its motions, when the floor underneath him began to give out an all too familiar quake. He glanced back to see that the very object of his fantasies, Bertha, had come into the break room.

Bertha’s presence made Glen stiffen his posture as anxiety began to claim him. He contemplated simply ignoring her, but that would be seen as too obvious. The blubbery turkey never used the call center break room, always opting to use her own office as a lunch area...for food that wasn't live, of course. He turned his head further and gave out a smile with a stutter. “He-Hello they're, Ms. Bertha! Did you need something? Some coffee, perhaps?” He tried to be polite, knowing full well that just because he had the most sales didn’t take him off the chopping block.

“Mmm...yeah, I wanted to have a word with you, Glen.” Bertha made her way towards the coffee machine where Glen was standing in front of. He turned around to fully face her just in time for her big, feathery belly to smoosh up against his torso, making his skin go red underneath his fur. The opossum looked up nervously to see the fat turkey smiling down on him. And for the first time since he joined the call center...it wasn’t the smile one would give to a good looking piece of meat. “I wanted to ask you...did you honestly think I couldn’t see that big, throbbing erection in your pants every time I walked by?”

Glen’s world seemed to fall apart as his eyes widened in horror. She found out, Berths had known about his crush on her this whole time! His legs went soft under her gaze, and if it wasn't for her belly pressing him against the counter he would have fallen to the floor. The opossum muster up all the courage he had and gulped before giving his reply. “Y-yeah...yeah, I thought I kept it hidden…”

“Ah, but it wasn’t. It was in plain sight from day one, and evan know I can feel your little boner press up against my big, comfy paunch.” She closed her eyes and sensually gripped both sides of her huge, heaving belly to lift it up before letting it fall. Glen began to shrivel evan further under her from the teasing, to which the turkey took much pleasure in. “I have a proposition for you, Glen. I need you to rank in a hundred sales by next week.”

“What?!” Glen shouted as much as he could with all that turkey flesh pressing into his lungs. Bertha’s pudgy wing hand smothered his mouth while the other one was raised in front of her face, making a shushing sound.

“Listen, Glen. I’m tired of taking charge of the call center, I’ve been her too long. It’s time I move up in this company, and I’m gonna use you to get what I want. A spot’s opened up for the regional director of sales, and whichever call center manager has the most commissions gets the job. You’re gonna be my ace in the hole, and as for your reward, not only will I promote you to manager…”

Big Bertha leaned past her vast cleavage to plant a gentle, soft kiss down on Glen’s forehead. The little opossum squirmed as every fantasy he had ever had about the turkey was coming true. “...I’ll give you a chance with a date. You seem cute enough, and maybe you’ll impress me enough to warrant another one. But, until than…” she finally released her vice grip on him, leaving her employee to call to the ground. “...you got a hundred calls to go.” With that, she left him with his pot of freshly brewed coffee and headed back to her office.

———————————————-

“Good afternoon!” Glen spoke into the mouthpiece with the first kind of genuine enthusiasm since he started at the call center. “My name is Glen, I’m a soulless telemarketer working at an unethical business calling you in hopes of selling a deceptively overpriced product. Before you hang up and wish I was dead, however, do you mind if I ask you a question?”

Almost everyone who had Glen’s voice in earshot suddenly stopped what they were doping to look around and give him an incredulous stare. The opossum ignored them, having anticipated such a response. If he was going to get a hundred commissions, his old tactics wouldn't work, he would have to go in bold. Brutal honesty, in his opinion, always caught people’s attention.

For a couple of seconds, there was nothing but silence on the receiver, until Glen heard a long and drawn out sigh. “Alright, let’s see where this goes. Shoot.” Jackpot.

“Have you recently lost a loved one to a predator?”

“...yeah.”

“Who?”

“My uh...one of my sons. One of the teachers from his school followed him home one day and…” Glen could tell his voice was breaking a little. Time to pivot away.

“That’s alright, sir, you don’t have to go nay further. Can you spare me the time for another question?”

“...mhmm.”

“Are you afraid it could happen again?”

At this point, he heard a choked sob on the other end. “Oh God...yes, yes of course I’m scared! I’ve been trying to play it cool, but...fuck!”

“This is where the soulless telemarketer comes in to play on your emotions.” One of Glen’s colleagues dropped a cup of coffee on the floor. This wasn’t bold, this was insane! “I work for a security system company, sir, I target potential prey customers that feel scared, vulnerable, and small. We can put cameras around your home to make sure would be predators won’t get away with what they’ve done. We can put alarms that notify the police when they detect a break in. We can put notifications on your phone when your sons don’t come home in time.”

Again, silence. Glen began to sweat bullets as almost every eye in the call center was on him. Was his plan crazy enough to work, or just plain crazy. Finally, the voice responded back. “Do you...have family packages?”

For the rest of the day at the office, Glen’s phone line was full of calls like that, and they almost always ended with a sale. His coworkers were so suprised and so taken aback that his ridiculous strategy worked, that they began to copy him. Soon, evreyone was getting good calls, which meant the opossum had to double down in his efforts to make sure he stood out on Friday.

The next day saw the call center break it’s record for sales taken in per day. On Monday they broke the record they had set for themselves. The day after that was full of good numbers, too, and the day after that, and the day after that...and pretty soon it was Friday again. And for the first time in a very long time, aside from a lack of excuses to eat her employees, Bertha was impressed. In the end, Glen didn’t make a hundred sales commissions...

He made more then twice that number.

“You know...I should probably kiss you for all this.” Bertha sighed wistfully as she packed up her personal things from Glen’s new office. The opossum could scarcely believe it, just last week he was some lowly, expendable phone jockey...now he was king of them! “That brutal honesty but you came up with? I thought you were batshit crazy out of your mind when I heard what you were saying...but hey, it’s not my problem any more, is it?”

“The office won’t be the same without you, Ms. Bertha.” Glen smiled sadly, happy to see the object of his fantasies move up in the world, but depressed he would no longer be able to see her down random colleagues when’re she was peckish. “I can only hope I can fill the shoes you left for me!”

“You better, boy, because the big leagues have quotas too.” Bertha smiled devious as she lifts the last box of her stuff into her arms. “I’ll be sure to stop on by when I think your a little short in sales...oh, and about your reward...”

Glen hadn’t forgotten about the promise of a date. He had everything planned out for a nice, relaxing evening at...

12411.content:
Sometimes when Dennis logged on to the vast expanse of the Internet, it was because he was feeling horny and wanted to ogle some pictures of fat predators stuffing down prey. Other times, the little mouse person went onto his computer to complain about his life under an anonymous username. He chose the handle '10X10Fates' which he justified was symbolic of his favorite number one hundred and the destinations his life may take to cover up it just sounded cool.

Today, however, was not like most of Dennis's days on the world wide web. Today, he set himself out to find a stable person who could fulfill his need for basic interaction. The outside world was a place of contempt for the mouse, it was loud and crowded with people he did not like, so he turned to social media and online forums to get his fix for conversation. It was incredibly uncommon for him to ever find someone like that as he surfed the many chat rooms...

However, sometimes the planets and stars above would align in just the right way, and Dennis would find himself in a conversation that was not only interesting but more importantly satisfying, one that didn't devolve into single phrases utterances and vulgar name calling. One of those days, as he was about to find out, was today.

10X10Fates / 10:10 A.M: Running the chance that I come off as an asshole, I never understood why the latest release of Mortal Dynasties was met with so much controversy. I'm not as die-hard a fan a lot of others are with the series, but it doesn't strike me as offensive.

Dennis the mouse had found a chat room dedicated to the discussion of Mortal Dynasties 7, and while he personally liked the game alright, he was surprised to see how merciless the community was being on it. Some claims were legitimate, but a lot of the stuff they were saying felt blown out of proportion. The biggest complaint? The ability for predator character selects to swallow the in-game enemies has been removed.

10X10Fates / 10:10 A.M: I mean...I'm a mouse, I don't know how it feels to have something like 'that' taken away from me, but death threats to the developers seems just a little extreme. Am I really the only one who thinks so?
RoseValkryie / 10:11 A.M: You're quite the bold one, letting everyone know what species you are.
10X10Fates / 10:11 A.M: Valkyrie..?
RoseValkryie / 10:11 A.M: Oh, don't mind me. I'm just trying to tease ya.
RoseValkryie / 10:12 A.M: Honestly, I'm not upset that I can't eat the in-game enemies anymore, I'm upset at the message of what the devs are saying. Us predators get enough bad looks from prey, we don't need our favorite video games to start.
RoseValkyrie / 10: 13 A.M: Still, I'm not gonna go down to their offices to pay them a visit I'm so mad. They'll probably cave in and make the option some DLC or something along the road...
10X10Fates / 10:14 A.M: Oh! I didn't know you were a pred.
RoseValkyrie / 10: 14 A.M: Is that gonna be an obstacle?
10X10Fates / 10: 15 A.M: Not at all! I just assumed that you were a prey after you spent so much time railing against the 'lure' option that the old games had for preds to bring love interests in the game like me back home to get eaten.
10X10Fates / 10: 15 A.M: I thought you had some pent up aggression after witnessing something like that.
RoseValkryie / 10:16 A.M: No no, I eat prey all the time. I'm just honest with my hunger, unlike so many others who like to trick their prey into false safety. It's the equivalent of pissing on a beloved pet before stomping their brains out.
10X10Fates / 10:18 A.M: Hmm-mm...I've always been a little nervous around preds, but the ones that are obviously being nice for a quick meal always irked me off in a special way. It's nice to hear that there are some that are courteous with their food to an extent.
RoseValkryie 10:19 A.M: And it's nice to see prey on this forum not log off the moment they find out I eat their species as a snack between meals~
10X10Fates / 10:20 A.M: Well, it makes me feel a little weird, but being hungry shouldn't make you a monster, right? Besides, it's not like you eat mice specifically.
RoseValkryie / 10:20 A.M: Yep! All food is equal in my gut.

Dennis remembered the username of the predator, and while the mouse surfed the web to see if their name popped up somewhere, he didn't obsess over it. At least, that's what he told himself. He had been online for a long enough time to find others who thought a conversation had meant friendship on the spot, that having the same liking of video games or what have you was enough to warrant free reign over his personal life. Eventually, the two found themselves chatting online once again.

In one of the many miscellaneous sub-chat rooms of a sub-chat room, Dennis and 'Valkyrie', in the midriff of several larger conversations happening at once, began to get to know each other better. No real names at first or any semblance of where they lived, but Dennis got to learn that Valkyrie was a professional video game critic. The mouse also learned that 'they' were a 'she', a very obese Giraffe 'she'.

Dennis's initial interest in 'Valkyrie' had been strained by the unforgiving truth that his mental fantasy of her would most likely never be met in reality, however an offhand comment that she lived in Zinnia City put some hope into his text. He had recently moved to ZC from Taxus Fields, a sleepy little town from the countryside, in search of better jobs. Their conversations were dominated by talking about video games and anime and every other nerd culture you could name under the sun, but sometimes they would veer towards the fact that she was a pred and that he was prey.

It felt strangely gratifying to hear the giraffe go into long detail about her 'food', from the preparations she took to catch a victim by surprise, to the digestion process, to the end result on her newly plumped body. Dennis felt a little ashamed at how much he was...enjoying himself with these turns in their talks, and it certainly made quite the obstacle to romantic fulfillment. It was great that they could talk so openly, but it wasn't exactly the seeds of a long term relationship.

But, it was still great to have a friend in Zinnia City, online or otherwise. Ever since he moved to ZC, his social life has taken a drastic plummet. So, when Anna griped one day about making a little bit more spending money and mused that she wouldn't mind having a roommate if she didn't freeze up around new people, Dennis's first instinct was to volunteer. 12411.title: Chat Room Conversations

124111.content:
Dennis looked down at the piece of printed paper with Anna's address in his hands, and then back up again at the massive, wooden door in front of him. He never really had too much time to settle down in his old apartment, so he was only carrying a few suitcases and a couple of cardboard boxes. The mouse was a bit nervous, not just because he was about to meet and move in with a predator he met online, but because of where he was overall.

Anna lived in a nice enough apartment building called Oleander Towers, built exclusively for Zinnia City's plus-sized population. Prey could live there, technically, but most don't since the ones that do end up getting gobbled up in the hallways or in the dead of night. Despite the strong foundations and supports, the manager of the place regulates the heavier the tenant's weight, the closer you live to the bottom. That way, when an accident happens, like a floor caving in, it shouldn't spiral out of control too much.

Anna lived pretty far down Oleander Towers, not too many flights of stairs from the ground floor. A bead of sweat running down his forehead, Dennis cautiously knocked firmly on the door to announce that he had arrived. The ground underneath him shook as the occupant inside made her way to him, and the wooden slab merely grazed the mouse as it swung open. He looked up to see his new roommate, and it took off all of his willpower to not drop his jaw at the sight of her.

Anna was dressed up in some pretty nerdy looking clothes, a sweater hoodie that had a video game logo emblazoned on the front, and a pair of yoga pants with a few stains. Yet despite that, the obese giraffe was still utterly stunning. She had long blond hair pulled back into a trendy ponytail, accented by her big, round eyes and thick, luscious lips. Her spotted stomach bulged out from her midriff like a wrecking ball, pushing up the hoodie to her breasts, which were already having trouble containing her heaving bosom. Her yoga pants hugged her massive rear end like a glove, leaving nothing to the imagination and was practically painted on.

She was beautiful, at least in Dennis's mind. Anna smiled shyly as she looked down past her big cleavage and belly at the adorable mouse boy in front of her door. "Hey there, Dennis!" She beamed with as much excitement her social anxiety would permit. "When I said 'as soon as you can', I guess you really took that to heart, huh?"

"Well, I guess I was just a bit...excited," Dennis revealed, rubbing a hand behind his neck as he gave out a nervous chuckle. "I think I'm more starved for someone to be around with than I thought."

"Oh, well...welcome to the club~" Anna blushed with a subtle wink, shifting her bulk to her left leg so that her new roommate could squeeze past her. "Come on in, let's get you settled in your new home."

Dennis returned the blush and accepted the offer to enter Anna's room. He took in the main room, certainly not the tidiest place in the world, but nothing you couldn't get used to. There were dirty clothes thrown about in random fashion, while the tables were stacked high with pizza boxes and fast food containers. Still, it wasn't too bad. It was an open space with a terrace window opposite the front door and two corridors leading off it, one to the left and one to the right.

Other than the mess that Anna's apartment was in, it was strangely cozy. Comfortable, black sofas and chairs were aligned to view a huge television on the far wall, probably where she did her video game streams. The decoration was sparse save for the piles of clothes and food wrappers, but what was present was tasteful and kind of high class. "So, Dennis, now that you're here it might be a good time to talk about ground rules." The giraffe shuffled around you, accidentally bumping you with her hip as she bent down to your eye level. "As you can tell, I'm not the cleanest person, and I sort of need some help keeping my place clean. Other than that, just make sure that half the rent gets paid by the end of the month, every month. Sound good?"

Dennis realized that he was idly twiddling with his thumbs and put a stop to it. Just because he was nervous didn't mean he had to show it. "S-sounds totally good, you can count on me!" He spoke with a bit too much enthusiasm. Although Anna seemed very nice and reserved, he knew that getting on a predator's bad side is a one-way ticket to being turned into pudge. "I'll definitely pull my weight, and if I gotta pull a bit of yours, then that's just fine too." The mouse smirked cheekily.

Than Dennis realized that he just made a joke about Anna's weight, and the smirk instantly dissipated. Before the mouse could apologize for his crass behavior, he noticed that the fat giraffe was smirking back. "Aw, Dennis. You're so cute!" She opened her arms wide for a hug, engulfing her roommate in her warm, squishy mass. It felt like a little slice of heaven for the rodent and almost reached out when her body was pulled away.

"Sooo...what do you think of your new home?" Anna asked, plopping down her generous bulk onto a large chair, the impact making her body bounce and ripple.

"It's pretty cool, I had no idea that playing video games could pay so well. But, uh...where do I put my stuff?"

"Huh? Oh, just about anywhere, really." Anna replied, nonchalantly flicking on the television before extending a pudgy arm towards one of the corridors. "I have a spare bedroom down the hall if you want."

Dennis did his best to follow Anna's vague sounding instructions, taking the right-hand hallway. The apartment wasn't too big, but it didn't feel stifling either, probably because the mouse was so tiny compared to the main occupant. All of the other rooms were in a similar state of untidiness, with things discarded left and right and everything being generally disorganized. After unpacking what few items Dennis had, he set out to clear up the mess as soon as he could, figuring that making himself useful now will make it easier to slack off later.

So, the mouse got to work. The containers of food were plentiful in his observations, yet each and every one of them had been picked clean. Everything had been going swimmingly until Dennis came across the issue with the clothing. They're was just...so much of it! The stuff on the ground wasn't even that dirty, but a thick film of dust seeped into all of the fabrics, thus began the herculean task of running back and forth to the laundry room. The process of cleaning the place took well over an hour, but soon the little prey was finished. Satisfied with his work, he returned to the main room to report back to Anna...

...to find the giraffe in nothing but her underwear.

Dennis froze, not very sure on how to tackle the situation he found himself in. Before him sat Anna, his confidant and new roommate, practically nude save for a black, lacy bra. The mouse made the assumption that she was sporting matching panties, but with her belly hanging down so boldly he couldn't really tell. The giraffe seemed so much...fatter now, more spread out on her chair. It was almost as if her body was now free to flow outwards, no longer constrained by her tight clothing.

"Oh, are you done already?" Anna's voice rang out in Dennis's ears, knocking him out of his stupor.

"Uh, eh...yep!" Was all the mouse could string together, trying to hide his flustered expression and failing miserably.

"Ah, good! I figured I might as well get myself comfy while you worked", she paused a little bit, unsure of herself, before only then realizing what the problem was. "I, uh...I guess I should have warned you what being comfy means to me..."

"It's fine!" The mouse blustered out. "I don't want you to feel like you have to act differently with me around. Honestly, I can just go into another room or..."

"Hey now, I don't want you to feel like a stranger in your own home." Anna assured, before shoving a handful of chocolate covered almonds into her mouth. "But...you know what might help?"

She tossed a friendly wink at Dennis, who was still visibly grappling with his sudden exposure to her bared figure. With a quick shake of his head, the mouse boy seemed to regain his composure at the topic of competitive gaming, his ears twitching happily as he returned the wink, “Not a chance - I've got over a hundred hours in already. “Oh no, I've got it–hmmph–you take a load off, you've been tidying up for over an hour now.” The giraffe girl had heaved herself up out of her deep-seated leather recliner, leaving behind an immense double indentation where her prodigious rear had settled.

Dennis stared as his seven-foot roommate stepped over to the entertainment center, popped one of the glass front panels open, and bent deeply at the waist to begin readying the gaming system. He wasn't sure if Anna might be unaccustomed to maintaining her modesty around guests, or if she was simply too laid-back to pay it much attention. Whatever the case, he was now standing barely beyond arm's length from her, gobstruck by the wall of smooth, spotted rump splayed out before him.

Just as the young mouse boy began to feel a telltale stirring in the front of his cargo shorts however, Anna straightened up with a heavy breath and swung around to face him, her long, blonde ponytail coming to rest over her shoulder, “Whew, all set - here ya go!” She held out a custom-painted controller for him, “It's going to be awfully embarrassing if you can't own up to all that bragging, haha.”

Had it not been for the thin fur on Dennis's face, Anna might have seen him blushing embarrassedly at the direction he had let his mind wander. Instead, he reached up and snatched the controller a little too quickly from her outstretched hand, eager for the distraction from her body, “J-just you wait, heh. Gonna get clobbered.”

The hefty giraffe girl turned away to thump heavily back down into her leather recliner, and Dennis thought he may have caught the hint of a smirk at the corner of her mouth. As she settled into the chair her mass wobbled slightly, sending rippling waves across the smooth skin of her belly. She tapped a few buttons on a remote to spur the TV to life, and then began navigating through the game menus on her controller. For his part, Dennis hopped up onto an adjacent couch, leaving a few feet between them. His gaze drifted back over to Anna's lace bound bust again. He had dated a couple of girls so far in his life, but they had been mice like him, and nowhere near as... robust.

“Hey–Dennis?” Anna asked politely, returning the mouse's stare. He snapped his eyes up to meet hers with a flush of shame, but hers were smiling as she gestured her controller toward the TV across the room. “You're not backing out on me, are you? Wouldn't blame you for surrendering now, haha.”

Sure enough, the electric glow of the high definition screen was displaying a character select menu with the text “Player 2 press X to Join” flashing expectantly. He swept up his controller, blurting “Right! Yeah, we're definitely still on! Just, ah, taking things in, sorry...”

As Dennis thumbed the joystick to comb through characters, he noticed that Anna had selected Farilya, a long time classic in the series. She was a heavy set, broad shouldered elephant, known for wading through waves of opposing minions to grapple, subdue, and swallow the enemy commander in the early game stages. For himself, he selected Griffin - a nimble, fleet-footed sparrowhawk. He knew he would need the speed to avoid Anna's towering character until he could gather enough buffing tokens to face her with even odds.

Anna's face set into a look of playful concentration as she selected a random map and watched the terrain load in. Her long, cream-and-yellow coated neck extended forward as she focused on placing her initial units. The TV light played across her moon pool eyes as they darted about, commanding the battlefield.

It wasn't until he heard the clash of combat, that Dennis realized he hadn't moved an inch from the spawning platform. Forcing his attention to the TV, he began frantically mustering defenses, but he could see that Anna's colossal elephant champion was already moving into his territory. He had given her a huge lead, made worse by the rushing play style she had selected.

Within minutes, she had reduced the majority of his rallying points to rubble and was now chasing his Griffin across the final areas of the map has he desperately tried to counter her advance. “Oh, looks like Mr. Expert Mouse Boy is gonna take a licking after all!” Anna croned teasingly as she began closing the gap between their characters.

Dennis chewed his lip with frustration at his own blundering performance is he made a last ditch effort to throw a punch or two at Farilya's immense frame. Anna's character brushed off the attack as if it had been nothing, before launching her elephant trunk forward to snatch Griffin off of the ground. Dennis was forced to watch as his character's health bar was squeezed into oblivion before Farilya hoisted the defeated bird avatar over her head, mouth open wide to receive her prize. The screen faded to black before the penultimate victory and a page appeared, displaying the horrendously one-sided match statistics.

“What did we call it, ten bucks? Looks like you owe me a pizza.” Anna chuckled good-naturedly. “I'm still bummed they decided to censor the victory animations. Would’ve been fun too gloat for an extra moment while you got gobbled up.” She was grinning at Dennis, clearly pleased that she had come out on top so easily. “Gotta say though, for the first couple of seconds there you were seriously off in la la land. Something on your mind?” The wry smirk was back again.

Dennis floundered, dually embarrassed by his underwhelming performance and the fact that his poor start had been noticed. “I was just, ah, my controller you know, and I was–” he fumbled for an excuse.

“–Staring?” Anna had an eyebrow raised in mock reproachfulness, but her lips were curled in smile. “Lighten up, haha. I'll take it as a compliment. My fault anyway, should’ve warned you before I stripped down earlier.” She turned back to the TV remote and pressed a few buttons, switching it over to a gaming commentary program before she lowered the volume. “It's been awhile since I've had someone look at me like that.”

Dennis had almost stammered a reply when she turned her hips to get up out of the recliner again, and he could swear she was putting on a show. He watched in side profile as she arched her back and stretched her arms toward the ceiling, displaying every curve and dimple in the flickering electric light, “Yaaaaawn… Think I'm gonna have to hit the hay though. You're welcome–”
